description: Jessie Colter"Cut-Throat"Ht: 6'2" WT: 200lbs Season W/L record ( 1-1)Marcus Ruhl"Titan"Ht: 5'11" WT: 210lbsSeason W/L record (1-1) The elimination rounds for Naked Kombat's Summer Smackdown Tournament continue as Jessie "Cut-Throat" Colter challenges body builder Marcus "Titan" Ruhl. Jessie plans on using his agility to let The Titan wear himself out. Marcus on the other hand says he's going to use brute strength against Cut-Throat and when he's finished he's going to punish him by fucking the hell out of his ass. Cut-Throat pounces on The Titan and manages to sit on his face, pulling on his balls at the same time. The Titan catches an elbow to the face but he shakes it off and bounces right back, catching Cut-Throat in a cradle. It's a battle of size vs speed as these two battle it out with raging hard cocks. Only one will move on to the quarter finals, but not before dominating the loser and fucking him senseless in the sex round!
title: Naked Kombat's Summer Smackdown 10-Man Tournament - Match 2
